author: cnbc.com
title: Cohu misses 4Q profit forecasts
text:
POWAY, Calif. (AP) _ Cohu Inc. (COHU) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter profit of $6.9 million.
On a per-share basis, the Poway, California-based company said it had profit of 23 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 28   fell short of Wall   three   for earnings of 31 cents per share.
The maker of semiconductor test equipment posted revenue of $84.1 million in the period.
  profit of $32.8 million, or $1.14 per share. Revenue was reported as $352.7 million.
For the current quarter ending in April, Cohu said it expects revenue in the range of $89 million.
Cohu shares have climbed slightly more than 4   In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $22.91, a rise of 71 percent in the last 12 months.
